Class Board

java.lang.Object
Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
Board represents the game's board, containing all Square data in a grid.
Author:
johnh

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int COLS
    Columns in grid.
    private Square[][] grid
    Grid 2d array storing each Square (by row then column).
    static int ROWS
    Rows in grid.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Board​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,​GameCharacter> characters, java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,​Estate> estates)
    Constructs a new board from a String template.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void configureEstateSquares()
    Configures all EstateSquares by determining if they are on the inside or outside, and which Square is directly outside if it is an entrance.
    void drawBoard​(java.awt.Graphics g)
    Draws the board by calling draw methods on Squares and drawing walls and entrances.
    Square getSquare​(int row, int col)
    Returns the Square at the specified position in the grid.
    private void initSquares​(java.lang.String template, java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,​GameCharacter> characters, java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,​Estate> estates)
    Iterates through the template String, initiating all Squares, placing characters, and adding EstateSquares to estates.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      Rows in grid.

      Constant Field Values

    • COLS

      public static final int COLS
      Columns in grid.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • grid

      private final Square[][] grid
      Grid 2d array storing each Square (by row then column).

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,​GameCharacter> characters, java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,​Estate> estates)
      Constructs a new board from a String template. Sets Character positions and places EstateSquares in Estates.
      Parameters:
      characters - game characters
      estates - game estates

  • Method Details

    • initSquares

      private void initSquares​(java.lang.String template, java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,​GameCharacter> characters, java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,​Estate> estates)
      Iterates through the template String, initiating all Squares, placing characters, and adding EstateSquares to estates.
      Parameters:
      template - text representation of board.
      characters - game characters.
      estates - game estates.

    • configureEstateSquares

      private void configureEstateSquares()
      Configures all EstateSquares by determining if they are on the inside or outside, and which Square is directly outside if it is an entrance.

    • getSquare

      public Square getSquare​(int row, int col)
      Returns the Square at the specified position in the grid.
      Parameters:
      row - row number
      col - column number
      Returns:
      Square if valid position, else null

    • drawBoard

      public void drawBoard​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draws the board by calling draw methods on Squares and drawing walls and entrances.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics object
